00058 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 u32 seed = 0x0000;
00060 u32 SW_sum, HW_sum;
00061 u8 crc_dat[9] = {'1','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9'};
00062 u8 i, crc_dat_reverse[9];
00063 
00064 /* CRC table for the CRC-16. The poly is 0x8005 (x^16 + x^15 + x^2 + 1)                                     */
00065 const u16 crc16_tab[256] =
00066 {
00067   0x0000, 0x8005, 0x800f, 0x000a, 0x801b, 0x001e, 0x0014, 0x8011,
00068   0x8033, 0x0036, 0x003c, 0x8039, 0x0028, 0x802d, 0x8027, 0x0022,
00069   0x8063, 0x0066, 0x006c, 0x8069, 0x0078, 0x807d, 0x8077, 0x0072,
00070   0x0050, 0x8055, 0x805f, 0x005a, 0x804b, 0x004e, 0x0044, 0x8041,
00071   0x80c3, 0x00c6, 0x00cc, 0x80c9, 0x00d8, 0x80dd, 0x80d7, 0x00d2,
00072   0x00f0, 0x80f5, 0x80ff, 0x00fa, 0x80eb, 0x00ee, 0x00e4, 0x80e1,
00073   0x00a0, 0x80a5, 0x80af, 0x00aa, 0x80bb, 0x00be, 0x00b4, 0x80b1,
00074   0x8093, 0x0096, 0x009c, 0x8099, 0x0088, 0x808d, 0x8087, 0x0082,
00075   0x8183, 0x0186, 0x018c, 0x8189, 0x0198, 0x819d, 0x8197, 0x0192,
00076   0x01b0, 0x81b5, 0x81bf, 0x01ba, 0x81ab, 0x01ae, 0x01a4, 0x81a1,
00077   0x01e0, 0x81e5, 0x81ef, 0x01ea, 0x81fb, 0x01fe, 0x01f4, 0x81f1,
00078   0x81d3, 0x01d6, 0x01dc, 0x81d9, 0x01c8, 0x81cd, 0x81c7, 0x01c2,
00079   0x0140, 0x8145, 0x814f, 0x014a, 0x815b, 0x015e, 0x0154, 0x8151,
00080   0x8173, 0x0176, 0x017c, 0x8179, 0x0168, 0x816d, 0x8167, 0x0162,
00081   0x8123, 0x0126, 0x012c, 0x8129, 0x0138, 0x813d, 0x8137, 0x0132,
00082   0x0110, 0x8115, 0x811f, 0x011a, 0x810b, 0x010e, 0x0104, 0x8101,
00083   0x8303, 0x0306, 0x030c, 0x8309, 0x0318, 0x831d, 0x8317, 0x0312,
00084   0x0330, 0x8335, 0x833f, 0x033a, 0x832b, 0x032e, 0x0324, 0x8321,
00085   0x0360, 0x8365, 0x836f, 0x036a, 0x837b, 0x037e, 0x0374, 0x8371,
00086   0x8353, 0x0356, 0x035c, 0x8359, 0x0348, 0x834d, 0x8347, 0x0342,
00087   0x03c0, 0x83c5, 0x83cf, 0x03ca, 0x83db, 0x03de, 0x03d4, 0x83d1,
00088   0x83f3, 0x03f6, 0x03fc, 0x83f9, 0x03e8, 0x83ed, 0x83e7, 0x03e2,
00089   0x83a3, 0x03a6, 0x03ac, 0x83a9, 0x03b8, 0x83bd, 0x83b7, 0x03b2,
00090   0x0390, 0x8395, 0x839f, 0x039a, 0x838b, 0x038e, 0x0384, 0x8381,
00091   0x0280, 0x8285, 0x828f, 0x028a, 0x829b, 0x029e, 0x0294, 0x8291,
00092   0x82b3, 0x02b6, 0x02bc, 0x82b9, 0x02a8, 0x82ad, 0x82a7, 0x02a2,
00093   0x82e3, 0x02e6, 0x02ec, 0x82e9, 0x02f8, 0x82fd, 0x82f7, 0x02f2,
00094   0x02d0, 0x82d5, 0x82df, 0x02da, 0x82cb, 0x02ce, 0x02c4, 0x82c1,
00095   0x8243, 0x0246, 0x024c, 0x8249, 0x0258, 0x825d, 0x8257, 0x0252,
00096   0x0270, 0x8275, 0x827f, 0x027a, 0x826b, 0x026e, 0x0264, 0x8261,
00097   0x0220, 0x8225, 0x822f, 0x022a, 0x823b, 0x023e, 0x0234, 0x8231,
00098   0x8213, 0x0216, 0x021c, 0x8219, 0x0208, 0x820d, 0x8207, 0x0202,
00099 };
00100 
00101 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00103   * @brief  Main program.
00104   * @retval None
00105   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00106 int main(void)
00107 {
00108   /* Enable CRC and PDMA Peripheral clock                                                                   */
00109   CKCU_Configuration();
00110 
00111   /* RETARGET Related configuration                                                                         */
00112   RETARGET_Configuration();
00113 
00114   printf("\r\n[CRC-16]");
00115   /* CRC-16
00116    * width:   16-bit
00117    * poly:    0x8005
00118    * seed:    0x0000
00119    * XOROut:  0x0000
00120    * RefIn:   Yes
00121    * RefOut:  Yes
00122    */
00123 
00124   /* SW CRC                                                                                                 */
00125   test_fun1();
00126 
00127   /* HW1 CRC, move data by CPU                                                                              */
00128   test_fun2();
00129 
00130   /* HW2 CRC, move data by CPU                                                                              */
00131   test_fun3();
00132 
00133   #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00134   /* HW3 CRC, move data by PDMA                                                                             */
00135   test_fun4();
00136   #endif
00137 
00138   while (1);
00139 }
00140 
00141 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00142   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00143   * @retval None
00144   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00145 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00146 {
00147   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00148   /* Enable CRC and PDMA Peripheral clock                                                                   */
00149   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA       = 1;
00150   CKCUClock.Bit.CRC        = 1;
00151   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00155   * @brief  SW CRC, move data by software.
00156   * @retval None
00157   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00158 void test_fun1(void)
00159 {
00160   printf("\r\n>  SW: ");
00161 
00162   for (i = 0; i < sizeof(crc_dat); i++)
00163   {
00164     crc_dat_reverse[i] = rbit_byte(crc_dat[i]);
00165   }
00166 
00167   SW_sum = crc16_fast((u16)seed, crc_dat_reverse, sizeof(crc_dat_reverse));
00168   SW_sum = rbit_hw(SW_sum);
00169   printf("sum = 0x%04X", SW_sum);
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00173   * @brief  HW1 CRC, move data by CPU.
00174   * @retval None
00175   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00176 void test_fun2(void)
00177 {
00178   printf("\r\n> HW1: ");
00179 
00180   HW_sum = CRC_16(seed, crc_dat, sizeof(crc_dat));
00181   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00185   * @brief  HW2 CRC, move data by CPU.
00186   * @retval None
00187   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00188 void test_fun3(void)
00189 {
00190   printf("\r\n> HW2: ");
00191 
00192   CRC_Configuration();
00193 
00194   CRC_Process(HT_CRC, crc_dat, 5);
00195 
00196   HW_sum = CRC_Process(HT_CRC, crc_dat + 5, 4);
00197   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00198 }
00199 
00200 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00202   * @brief  HW3 CRC, move data by PDMA.
00203   * @retval None
00204   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00205 void test_fun4(void)
00206 {
00207   printf("\r\n> HW3: ");
00208 
00209   CRC_Configuration();
00210 
00211   PDMA_Configuration();
00212 
00213   PDMA_SwTrigCmd(PDMA_CH0, ENABLE);
00214 
00215   while (PDMA_GetFlagStatus(PDMA_CH0, PDMA_FLAG_TC) == RESET);
00216   PDMA_ClearFlag(PDMA_CH0, PDMA_FLAG_TC);
00217 
00218   HW_sum = CRC_Process(HT_CRC, NULL, 0);
00219   printf("sum = 0x%04X", HW_sum);
00220 }
00221 #endif
00222 
00223 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00224   * @brief  8-bit reverse.
00225   * @retval None
00226   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00227 u8 rbit_byte(u8 in)
00228 {
00229   u32 out = RBIT((u32)in);
00230 
00231   return (u8)(out >> 24);
00232 }
00233 
00234 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00235   * @brief  16-bit reverse.
00236   * @retval None
00237   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00238 u16 rbit_hw(u16 in)
00239 {
00240   u32 out = RBIT((u32)in);
00241 
00242   return (u16)(out >> 16);
00243 }
00244 
00245 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00246   * @brief  crc16_fast.
00247   * @retval None
00248   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00249 u16 crc16_fast(u16 crc, u8* buffer, u32 length)
00250 {
00251   while (length--)
00252     crc = crc16_tab[(crc >> 8 ^ *buffer++) & 0xFF] ^ (crc << 8);
00253 
00254   return crc;
00255 }
00256 
00257 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00258   * @brief  Configure the CRC.
00259   * @retval None
00260   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00261 void CRC_Configuration(void)
00262 {
00263   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00264      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00265      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00266   */
00267   CRC_InitTypeDef CRC_InitStructure;
00268   CRC_InitStructure.Mode = CRC_16_POLY;
00269   CRC_InitStructure.uSeed = seed;
00270   CRC_InitStructure.uCR = 0;
00271   CRC_Init(HT_CRC, &CRC_InitStructure);
00272 }
00273 
00274 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00275 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00276   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00277   * @retval None
00278   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00279 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00280 {
00281   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00282      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00283      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00284   */
00285   PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00286   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr   = (u32)crc_dat;
00287   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr   = (u32)&HT_CRC->DR;
00288   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt    = sizeof(crc_dat)/3;
00289   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen    = 3;
00290   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize  = WIDTH_8BIT;
00291   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority  = L_PRIO;
00292   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod    = (SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX);
00293   PDMA_Config(PDMA_CH0, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00294   PDMA_IntConfig(PDMA_CH0, (PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC), ENABLE);
00295   PDMA_EnaCmd(PDMA_CH0, ENABLE);
00296 }
00297 #endif
00298 
00299 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00300 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00301   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00302   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00303   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00304   * @retval None
00305   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00306 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00307 {
00308   /*
00309      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00310      Debug message can be added here.
00311      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00312   */
00313 
00314   while (1)
00315   {
00316   }
00317 }
00318 #endif
